dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2012 contains 20 foreground classes and one background class in realistic scenes. The dataset is commonly used for training and evaluating semantic segmentation models.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:description: CVC-EndoSceneStill is a benchmark for endoluminal scene segmentation of colonoscopy images, containing images of polyps and background classes.
dcterms:title: CVC-EndoSceneStill

dcterms:description: LIDC-IDRI holds 1018 lung computed tomography (CT) scans, annotated by four thoracic radiologists, used for evaluating segmentation models in the context of lung nodules.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
